title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average number of people, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Average number of people has decreased over the Year.
Average number of people is roughly constant from 2000 to 2003, gradually decreasing from 2003 to 2004, and lastly roughly constant from 2004 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2003 and 2004.
Max Average number of people about 3.0 was recorded at Year 2000,  2001,  2002, and 2003
Min Average number of people about 2.9 was recorded at Year 2004,  2005,  2006,  2007,  2008,  2009,  2010,  2011,  2012,  2013,  2014,  2015,  2016, and 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average number of people, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely constant which exists from 2004 to 2017.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2000 to 2004.
